basic_node.title: Object part surface color
basic_node.description: Color of object part surface being determined by non-absorbed but reflected portion of wavelengths of incident solar radiation hitting the object part surface material.
basic_node.references: [sp47, https://linkinghub.elsevier.com/retrieve/pii/S0924271615002658] [sp47, https://www.osapublishing.org/abstract.cfm?URI=ao-54-30-8904] [sp47, https://www.osapublishing.org/abstract.cfm?URI=josaa-31-9-2055] [sp47, https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/document/8917455/] [sp48, https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/document/9197138/] [sp46, https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/document/8500511/, Mutual influence of absorption; reflection and transmission: A + R + T = 1 with hemispherical absorptance A; hemispherical reflectance R; hemispherical transmittance T. Thus; causes for one of these three inevitably affect the other two.] [sp46, https://linkinghub.elsevier.com/retrieve/pii/S0924271612000378, Mutual influence of absorption; reflection and transmission: A + R + T = 1 with hemispherical absorptance A; hemispherical reflectance R; hemispherical transmittance T. Thus; causes for one of these three inevitably affect the other two.] [sp46, http://link.springer.com/10.1007/978-3-319-12352-3_18, Mutual influence of absorption; reflection and transmission: A + R + T = 1 with hemispherical absorptance A; hemispherical reflectance R; hemispherical transmittance T. Thus; causes for one of these three inevitably affect the other two. See p.415.]
